snippet: At the Waverly Inn last night, friends and editors celebrated the five-year anniversary of the New York label Ohne Titel with its designers, Flora Gill and Alexa Adams.
abstract: At the Waverly Inn last night, friends and editors celebrated the five-year anniversary of the New York label Ohne Titel with its designers, Flora Gill and Alexa Adams.
lead_paragraph: At the Waverly Inn last night, friends and editors celebrated the five-year anniversary of the New York label Ohne Titel with its designers, Flora Gill and Alexa Adams. Hosted by John Demsey, the president of Esteé Lauder Cosmetics, and M.A.C., the intimate affair in the Waverly's fire-warmed back room was billed proudly as an opportunity for Gill and Adams to thank and honor the many stylish women who have inspired and supported their label over the years. Among those in attendance were Paper Magazine's Kim Hastreiter, the T contributor Lynn Yaeger, Cecilia Dean and Michelle Harper. The odd man out - and a delightful surprise to see at the room's elegant, ranunculus-full tables - was Antony Hegarty, the lead singer for Antony and the Johnsons. Calm and gracious (with less than two weeks before their fall 2012 runway showon Monday, Feb. 12 at Milk Studios), Gill and Adams gave guests an evening as refreshing and hip as their recent collections. "Now, it's just about the details," said Gill about what's left to do before Fashion Week starts. Cheers to that.
